text:
STYLIGHT, Munich, Germany

STYLIGHT is the best place to discover and shop fashion from the best online stores. We are a team of 20 engineers with a great & fun culture. We do throw parties, play beer pong and have a good time. Do join us or stop by for a coffee.

===

We're hiring:

- Agile Coach (http://www.stylight.com/Jobs/Details/Agile-Coach-oOEjZfwu/)

- Automation Engineer / DevOps (http://www.stylight.com/Jobs/Details/Automation-Engineer-Per...)

- Backend-Developer Python or Java (http://www.stylight.com/Jobs/Details/Backend-Developer-oXi5X...)

- Frontend Developer (http://www.stylight.com/Jobs/Details/Frontend-Developer-o0AK...) - Internship / Working Student System Administration (http://www.stylight.com/Jobs/Details/Internship-System-Admin...)

- Android Developer (http://www.stylight.com/Jobs/Details/Junior-Android-Develope...)

===

Do ping me on HN or write me sebastian.schuon@stylight.com (Co-Founder)
